title: Ukraine: Kyiv and several cities hit by Russian missiles
description: Ukrainian officials say they've shot down 43 of the more than 80 Russian missiles.  Also, Taiwan’s President Tsai Ing-wen marks the country's national day with a warning. And the head of Canada's ice hockey governing board resigns amid a sexual assault scandal.
itunes:subtitle: Ukrainian officials say they've shot down 43 of the more than 80 Russian missiles
itunes:summary: Ukrainian officials say they've shot down 43 of the more than 80 Russian missiles.  Also, Taiwan’s President Tsai Ing-wen marks the country's national day with a warning. And the head of Canada's ice hockey governing board resigns amid a sexual assault scandal.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
